session21_error.description: Used ρ_vis instead of ρ_total in coherence

comparison.improvement: Sign corrected, magnitude error reduced from infinite to 33%

possible_explanations: Transition zone effects where ρ_dark ~ ρ_vis

conclusion: β derivation gap RESOLVED: error identified in Session #21, corrected formula β = 1/(1+2γ) gives right sign and improved magnitude
